body.name: TTVIEW 5 Drawer Dresser Chest, Freestanding Dresser Storage Tower with Metal Handles, White Storage Cabinet for Living Room, Kitchen, Entryway, White…
features: Multipurpose locker: ❥❥❥❥❥ This white dresser features clean lines with a simple and versatile style. The vertical design and easy-to-use chest of drawers is suitable for most places in the kitchen, living room, entrance, study, etc. It is a good choice to use alone or with other furniture accessories.

Spacious large tabletop & 5 drawers: ❥❥❥❥❥ The modern white dresser is equipped with 5 drawers, each drawer measures 21.4” L x 13.8” W x 4.7” H. It is a great place for storing books, toys, and documents. In addition, the spacious top table can also place keys, alarm clocks, photo frames, and daily needs.

Beautiful appearance & good quality: ❥❥❥❥❥- The high quality handle of the tall white dresser gives you a good touch. Repeated spray painting process to ensure that the floor cabinet is not easy to fall off the paint, not easy to get wet. We have always been concerned about your experience.

Effort-saving & comfortable to use ❥❥❥❥❥ The 5 drawer dresser uses metal slide rails, which can ensure smooth operation without pulling the handle very hard, and the drawers can also be smoothly retracted on the metal slide rails, which is labor-saving and convenient. Each drawer can hold up to 22 pounds to meet your storage needs.

DIY assembly is required ❥❥❥❥❥ Our products are equipped with clear assembly steps, you can assemble by yourself or with your family according to the instructions, and quickly have a simple and stylish dresser. If you have any questions before and after purchase, you can communicate with us by email at any time, we will try our best to solve your problem, no need to worry about after-sales problems.
body.description: TTVIEW 5 Drawer Dresser Chest with a versatile style, fashion, and personality. There is plenty of storage space for books, toys, small items, and more, making it a great helper for organizing things. 5 Large Drawers: Drawers measure 21.4” L x 13.8” W x 4.7” H, and a single drawer can hold 22 lbs. You can easily organize your items and make everything just a strip. Safe and stable: Install a fall restraint device to avoid injury caused by falling to the greatest extent. High-quality Metal handle: easy to pull and not easy to damage. Easy to assemble: One person can assemble this, but two people will be faster! Specifications Material: E0 MDF+PB Board Overall product size: 23.6''L x 15.7''W x39.37''H Gross Weight: 79.98 lbs Color: White

Package Contents 1 x locker 1 x instruction manual All required hardware accessories TTVIEW 5 Drawer Dresser Chest with a versatile style, fashion, and personality. There is plenty of storage space for books, toys, small items, and more, making it a great helper for organizing things. 5 Large Drawers: Drawers measure 21.4” L x 13.8” W x 4.7” H, and a single drawer can hold 22 lbs. You can easily organize your items and make everything just a strip. Safe and stable: Install a fall restraint device to avoid injury caused by falling to the greatest extent. Roomy Top Table Top The large 15.7-inch wide tabletop can place alarm clocks, desk calendars, potted plants and frequently used items, etc. It is convenient for your use and placement, making the details of life more comfortable and comfortable. Five Large Drawers The configuration of five large drawers makes your storage no longer difficult. Your books, tableware, etc., can be placed in the cabinet in an orderly manner. Trust that it will all become just organized, giving you a clean and tidy atmosphere. Delicate Metal Handle The silver metal handles on the drawers are elegant and generous, both smooth to the touch and sturdy quality. All drawers open and close on smooth metal slides when in use, making your use easy and effortless.
This five-drawer locker can be placed in the kitchen, living room, entrance, study,etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE this dresser with my entire soul. I needed somewhere to put my gym leggings in my fitness closet and it was perfect. Listen, the box is heavy but it’s legit super easy to assemble (took me 2hours) shipping was like 3 days even though they said it would take more than a week. It’s not super deep but the measurements are correct (i checked myself lol) if you need something practical this is it & it is super GOOD quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’m so happy with my purchase it’s such a high quality dresser for such a good price. It took me about 3 hours to build all by myself but it was probably the easiest piece of furniture i’ve ever built. Love this dresser!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put together, very nice looking and nice amount of space. It doesn't take up too much space and I really like it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A lot of work.
reviews.reviewText: Take time to build or assemble. Manual of instruction not good. Black and white hand written.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s pretty good
reviews.reviewText: Pretty good and easy to assemble

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars VERY high quality!
reviews.reviewText: This was a fantastic value for the money - extremely high quality parts, with extra screws etc. in case you lose one.Very clear instructions, very sturdy, looks great when complete. SO much higher quality kit than I've seen with all other self-assemble products from other vendors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price
reviews.reviewText: But…. The drawers are short and cannot fit very much in them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits most spaces and holds a lot.
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put together. Would have liked slightly deeper drawers.
